Improvements

Optimisation

The performance of Oolong has not been tested with real-world examples. Hence it has also not been optimised.

Features

[//]: # (TODO: link to GitHub) Multiple features could be added to the language. A conclusive list is the GitHub repository.

Compilation in Julia

Whether compilation could be done in Julia, and how well that would work, is still an open question.
